wikipedia_page.main: Kyle Philip Wilson (born 14 November 1985) is an English footballer. He has previously played for Crewe Alexandra, Macclesfield Town, FC United of Manchester, Chester and Bangor City. He also represented England U18 and U19 earning 14 youth international caps.
